titles.title: To make a minor adjustment in the exterior boundary of the Devils Backbone Wilderness in the Mark Twain National Forest, Missouri, to exclude a small parcel of land containing improvements.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Agriculture
Referred to House Resources
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forestry, Resource Conservation and Research.
Executive Comment Requested from USDA.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.
Subcommittee on Forestry, Resource Conservation and Research Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Agriculture. H. Rept. 105-295, Part I.
House Committee on Resources Granted an extension for further consideration ending not later than Oct. 2, 1997.
Committee on Resources discharged.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 169.

action.text: Mr. Blunt moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Favorable Executive Comment Received from USDA.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 105-232.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 446.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 6/4/1997--Introduced. Modifies the boundary of the Devils Backbone Wilderness in the Mark Twain National Forest, Missouri, to exclude a specified parcel of real property.
